name: medical-platform
description: Medical Platform - X-ray scans, blood tests, and reservations system

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo "âœ… Setup complete! Check INSTALLATION.md or QUICK_START.md for next steps."
scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run install:backend && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile && npm run install:shared
scripts.install:mobile: cd mobile && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npx expo install --fix
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "BACKEND,WEB,MOBILE" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:web && npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:shared
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:web
